title: Photodegradation of the main synthetic musk (HHCB) in water: Kinetic study and influencing factors
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00351A, Paper
Hatice Turan, Mathieu Sebilo, T. Pigot, mathilde monperrus
Galaxolide (HHCB) is the most common synthetic musk compound detected in numerous daily products. Despite its persistence in the aquatic environment, the photodegradation of HHCB remains poorly understood. In this...
